title: Micael Sequeira
text:
Micael Martins Sequeira (born 6 July 1973) is a <a href="Portugal">Portuguese</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> manager who manages <a href="PFC%20Lokomotiv%20Tashkent">Lokomotiv Tashkent</a>.
Career.
In 2008, Sequeira was appointed manager of Portuguese third division side <a href="C.A.%20Valdevez">Arcos de Valdevez</a> after managing the youth academy of <a href="S.C.%20Braga">Braga</a> in the Portuguese top flight.
In 2009, he was appointed manager of Portuguese second division club <a href="C.D.%20Aves">Aves</a>.
In 2012, he was appointed manager of <a href="F.C.%20Famalic%C3%A3o">Famalicão</a> in the Portuguese third division.
In 2013, Sequeira was appointed manager of Portuguese second division team <a href="C.D.%20Trofense">Trofense</a>. After that, he was appointed manager of <a href="Merelinense%20F.C.">Merelinense</a> in the Portuguese fourth division, helping them achieve promotion to the Portuguese third division.
In 2017, he was appointed manager of Portuguese third division outfit <a href="S.C.%20Freamunde">Freamunde</a>. After that, Sequeira was appointed youth manager of <a href="Al%20Nassr%20FC">Al Nassr</a> in Saudi Arabia.
In 2021, he was appointed manager of Uzbekistani side <a href="PFC%20Lokomotiv%20Tashkent">Lokomotiv (Tashkent)</a>.
